action_items: Implement 'static_mesh.shrinkwrap_v1' recipe support in Blender backend (affects 3 static mesh assets)
Implement '_deform_taper_bulge_twist' function in Blender backend (affects 2 character assets)
Add 'humanoid' skeleton preset support for character generation (affects 1 character asset)
Update schema validation to handle optional 'extrusion_steps' or add defaults to character specs (affects 5 character assets)
Fix animation GLB parsing/mesh analysis pipeline - 16 assets failing with 'no geometry' errors
Investigate animation generation exit codes (1 and 2) for 9 assets that fail without GLB output
Resolve missing external mesh dependencies for skinned mesh assets (character_skinned, skinned_mesh_basic)
Review and fix field name mismatches in character specs causing validation failures
Validate triangle budget enforcement for mesh_comprehensive spec or adjust budget parameters
Fix mesh_solidify dimension validation to handle edge case with Z=0

critical_issues.issue: Animation GLB parsing failing - Mesh has no geometry errors
critical_issues.description: 16 animation assets are generating GLB files but mesh analysis reports no geometry, indicating corrupted output or parser incompatibility
Character preset system lacks 'humanoid' skeleton definition causing generation failures
5 character specs fail schema validation due to missing required 'extrusion_steps' field in bone_meshes configuration
Character generation fails because the taper/bulge/twist deformation function is not implemented in the Blender backend

critical_issues.issue: Field name mismatches in character specs
critical_issues.description: Spec field names may not match expected schema causing validation issues
3 static mesh assets use shrinkwrap_v1 recipe which is not yet implemented in the generator
2 skinned mesh character specs reference external GLB files that do not exist

notes: Overall validation success rate: 26% (14 of 54 assets passed full validation)
Static meshes show highest success rate at 69% (11 of 16 assets)
Characters achieve 23% success rate (3 of 13 assets) with schema issues as primary blocker
Animations have 0% full validation success but 64% (16 of 25) generated GLB files
17 total lint warnings across all phases - all are non-critical
2 non-manifold geometry errors in static meshes (mesh_edge_split, environment_house)
All 11 successful static meshes have UV maps present
All 3 successful characters have proper skeleton structures with 12-20 bones
Top failure categories: Animation GLB parsing (16), Missing extrusion_steps (5), Missing shrinkwrap recipe (3), Missing deform function (2), Missing dependencies (2)
